results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse speaks directly to the peace that comes from God, which is beyond human comprehension.
results.reflection: True peace is found in trusting God and allowing His presence to protect our hearts.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights the connection between trust in God and the experience of perfect peace.
results.reflection: Focusing on God brings a tranquility that the world cannot offer.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus promises a unique peace that He leaves with His followers, distinct from worldly peace.
results.reflection: Embrace the peace Jesus offers, which calms fears and troubles.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: This verse encourages believers to allow Christ's peace to govern their hearts, fostering unity and gratitude.
results.reflection: Christ's peace is a guiding force that unites us and fills us with gratitude.

results.text: In peace I will both lie down and sleep; for you alone, O Lord, make me dwell in safety.
results.reason: This verse expresses the confidence in God's protection that allows for peaceful rest.
results.reflection: Resting in God's safety brings peace and security in every situation.
